column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Wednesday April 7 at 6:30 a.m.

column4: Wednesday April 7 thru Saturday April 10 at Rupp Arena.
Use added caution if traveling downtown and watch for pedestrians.
Work starts Wednesday April 7 and is expected to last about 18 months.
Motorists should expect delays in the area between New Circle Rd and Pasadena Dr.
Use added caution if traveling in the area.
